title: Litro pays USD 3.9 Mn for LP Gas
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro gas noted that the payments were made to the Gas Tanker which was anchored for seven days at the Thaldiyawatta coast in Kerawalapitiya.
A spokesperson for Litro said that USD 3.9 Mn was paid for the shipment, and demurrage cost of Rs. 20 Million.
Meanwhile, Litro gas said that it will commence distributing LP Gas to the market from Wednesday (15).
